messages.message: Look at the digit in the onesEx. If given "12", "2" is in the ones place. place. Use the Cree translation of the digitEx. "2" = "nîso".
and add the proper suffixUse the "-osâp" suffix..
and add the proper suffixUse the "-sâp" suffix..
, remove the last two letters"ik" of the digit, and then add the proper suffixUse the -osâp" suffix..
